alert.note: Alert for East Platte County; Goshen County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 4:17PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Goshen and northeastern Platte Counties through 500 PM MDT... At 416 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles southwest of Rawhide Buttes, or 23 miles south of Lusk, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Jay Em around 435 PM MDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Hwy 85 At Dry Rawhide Creek and Hartville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
